item.title: RF plugs clean integration
item.description: Introduction Since I’m lazy, I wanted to control remotely two floor lamps in my house. I bought some cheap RF outlets, but I did not want to have another ugly looking and always lost remote control in the house. So a clean solution was needed ! This is the kind of RF plug I used : The idea was to add a standard light switch in an existing box.
